adventure.name: Boring Example Game
adventure.info:
Story: Mine
 Images: Mine
 
 Created this year.

do.say: This is a quite boring example house.\n But when you look exactly...

item.name: Table

onuse.do: There is a duck with a hat on the table.

item.onusewith: The duck looks too boring for this table.
You put the funny looking duck on the table.

item.name: Wardrobe
item.onuse: The wardrobe is locked, you cannot open it.
item.onusewith: The key fits and you can open the wardrobe now.

location.name: Example Garden

init.do: This is a super boring example garden.

location.item: There is a little lake with some animals.

item.name: Gate
item.do: You don't want to leave this garden. You are too bored.
You find a grey stone and you take it, so you forget that you wanted to leave the garden.

location.name: Wardrobe Man

init.do: The man in the wardrobe looks friendly and says: "Welcome to my wardrobe!"
There is a man in the wardrobe. He seems to be scared.\n "Why did you open my wardrobe? I want to be alone!"

location.item: "I am too sad in my boring house, so I started to live in my wardrobe."

item.name: Can I do something for you?
item.do: "You did all you can already, thank you."
"Close my wardrobe and let me alone! Without my stone nothing has sense."

item.name: How did you lose your stone?

location.item: "I wanted to leave this place, but I lost my stone, so I returned. I was very scared!"

objects.ongive: "Wow! My stone! I missed it so much, thank you. I will be more friendly with you now."
objects.onnoneed: "Leave me alone with your boring things!"

adventure.objectdef: The duck looks funny with the hat.
